title: Kled Interaction with Plants Not Cool
body: So, I find myself not wanting to use plants almost ever when roaming with Kled due to the fact that it turns on his W passive, making it so I'm vulnerable and that I have to wait for it to come back up before beginning whatever kind of attack I was planning on. Is this intentional or can there be a patch worked in to make the W passive not activate on plants?

This is a game-wide problem - even as you cancel an auto attack, as the animation winds up and nears firing at or hitting the target, the Shiv / Rapidfire effect proc and are consumed, regardless of completion of the auto attack.
Isn't it technically a displacement? Which is a type of CC, of which he is immune to during his empowered W?
Yeah. In fact, apparently, if you have Courage of the Colossus and you hit a blast cone on an enemy champion, it will proc the shield on you. Lol.

Isn't that completely intentional? I believe it originally did give courage then was removed about 2 patches after his release. I don't play much kled so I could be wrong but I thought that was a patch change a while back.

He never ever gained courage in the jungle, It's intentional since Riot Games don't want him on Jungle role just like Talon, They won't let Noxian Diplomacy work on monsters in the jungle except it works on Drake.
Sure, but they could at least let him have the same amount of courage gained as from minions - counting you get wayyy less monsters than minions.
Can you keep it on champions with innate heals in their abilities, Yorick for example. I often use a plant to get some extra hp with q.
they removed to off wards so i dont think riot would allow that
But it does work on wards. The lifesteal doesn't, but the abilities heal does work.

Evelynn's invisibility gets dropped from hitting plants as well, but I wouldn't be too surprised if that was intentional. 

Spooking people with ghost plants popping does sound right up my alley however
sorry to hijack this thread but Kennen has this happen to him also :S if you throw your empowered W auto and the target dies before it lands you loose the buff
I really wish I could just...activate his W? I mean I know it's free, but I feel like I waste it every time I'm attacking minions.

Keep the interaction for Rapid Fire though, unless you guys make it so it doesn't give passive bonus range against plants. Nothing would be worse than Cait being able to freely blast you back into her team.
I think Statikk and RFC have the same mechanics so they can't change one without also modifying the other

It's not a "bad" case, but it seems slightly inconsistent to me.

{{champion:101}} can auto attack plants to restore mana using his passive
{{champion:4}} can *not* use Blue Card on plants to get mana back
{{champion:75}} can *not* Q plants to get stacks

The 6.24 patch notes said "**activating plants should feel similar to attacking wards**", and I would take that to mean that it should feel the same as killing a ward too (It specifically mentions that Poppy's passive bounces to her the same as if she'd killed a unit). It seems like TF and Nasus should be able to use their spells that benefit themselves (and happen to be auto attack dependent), given that Xerath is able to use his passive that benefits himself against plants.

TF has the case that his W has 3 different cards and when 1 should proc, all should or else it kinda would cause clarity issues.

and no one want's to stun a plant, so i think TF W shouldn't ever proc on plants.
I think if you made Kled's W an activate he would be a much more viable champion.
He'd be broken. It's that way intentionally to limit his power and make him decide between farming and staying prepared for an attack.

How would he be broken? It's on a high cooldown and he's horrifically weak by the fact that he can't choose when it triggers. They should just lower the attack speed it gives if it's too strong as an active.

Instead of balancing it as a gimmick, they should balance it as a normal ability.

It gives him a lot of dueling power and the rest of his kit gives him a lot of sticking power which means its very hard to bait it then disengage for his opponents. Kled is also not horrifically weak, he has a 51% win rate on Champion.gg and while I don't trust the data completely since some aspects of it seem very strange, it's probably close enough that we can say he's not massively weak or strong right now.
Oh and Morde had a 54% winrate once jungle. Doesn't make him strong. Kled has a low playrate.

Kled has a 1.75% playrate in top lane. This is certainly below the 3.63% avg for top lane champs, but it's not nonexistent and is a statistically significant amount of games to get an idea of his strength.

If you click on a plant as a burrowed Rek'Sai she pops out of the ground when she reaches it and then stands there awkwardly staring at it. 

It's bizzare because if you attack anything else in the game she uses her W CD and starts attacking it,  but if you do it on a plant she just stands there and makes for clunky af plant use unless you unburrow first and then issue the attack command.  Wich begs the question,  why not just have it work like it does with everything else if I have to manually activate my W to use them fluidly in the first place???? 

There's a bunch of other shitty interactions too,  like it using Zeal procs and other on-hit passives and effects and setting them on CD.  Which begs another question,  why aren't ya'll fixing this crap?
